name: anb-api-tests
description: Newman scripts para testing de API ANB

scripts.test:report: newman run ANB_Collection.json -e ANB_Environment.json --reporters html,cli --reporter-html-export test-report.html
scripts.test:slow: newman run ANB_Collection.json -e ANB_Environment.json --delay-request 1000 --reporters html --reporter-html-export slow-test-report.html
